quote: I don't want you to change, Bridgette. I'm not in love with who you could be, or who you used to be, or who the world says you should be. I'm in love with you. Right now. Just like this.
quote_letters: I DONT WANT YOU TO CHANGE BRIDGETTE IM NOT IN LOVE WITH WHO YOU COULD BE OR WHO YOU USED TO BE OR WHO THE WORLD SAYS YOU SHOULD BE IM IN LOVE WITH YOU RIGHT NOW JUST LIKE THIS
